verses.text_plain: I am sought of them that asked not for me; I am found of them that sought me not: I said, Behold me, behold me, unto a nation that was not called by my name.
verses.verse_html: 1I am sought of them that asked not for me; I am found of them that sought me not: I said, Behold me, behold me, unto a nation that was not called by my name.

tokens.text: Behold me, behold me, unto a nation

verses.text_plain: I have spread out my hands all the day unto a rebellious people, which walketh in a way that was not good, after their own thoughts;
verses.verse_html: 2I have spread out my hands all the day unto a rebellious people, which walketh in a way that was not good, after their own thoughts;

verses.text_plain: A people that provoketh me to anger continually to my face; that sacrificeth in gardens, and burneth incense upon altars of brick;
verses.verse_html:
3A people that provoketh me to anger continually to my face; that sacrificeth in gardens, and burneth incense upon altars of brick; ▼
▼ upon…: Heb. upon bricks

footnotes.body_html: ▼ upon…: Heb. upon bricks

verses.text_plain: Which remain among the graves, and lodge in the monuments, which eat swine’s flesh, and broth of abominable things is in their vessels;
verses.verse_html:
4Which remain among the graves, and lodge in the monuments, which eat swine’s flesh, and broth of abominable things is in their vessels; ▼
▼ broth: or, pieces

verses.text_plain: Which say, Stand by thyself, come not near to me; for I am holier than thou. These are a smoke in my nose, a fire that burneth all the day.
verses.verse_html:
5Which say, Stand by thyself, come not near to me; for I am holier than thou. These are a smoke in my nose, a fire that burneth all the day. ▼
▼ nose: or, anger

tokens.text: to me; for I am holier

verses.text_plain: Behold, it is written before me: I will not keep silence, but will recompense, even recompense into their bosom,
verses.verse_html: 6Behold, it is written before me: I will not keep silence, but will recompense, even recompense into their bosom,

tokens.text: me: I will not keep silence

verses.text_plain: Your iniquities, and the iniquities of your fathers together, saith the Lord, which have burned incense upon the mountains, and blasphemed me upon the hills: therefore will I measure their former work into their bosom.
verses.verse_html: 7Your iniquities, and the iniquities of your fathers together, saith the Lord, which have burned incense upon the mountains, and blasphemed me upon the hills: therefore will I measure their former work into their bosom.

verses.text_plain: Thus saith the Lord, As the new wine is found in the cluster, and one saith, Destroy it not; for a blessing is in it: so will I do for my servants’ sakes, that I may not destroy them all.
verses.verse_html: 8Thus saith the Lord, As the new wine is found in the cluster, and one saith, Destroy it not; for a blessing is in it: so will I do for my servants’ sakes, that I may not destroy them all.

tokens.text: in it: so will I do
sakes, that I may not destroy

verses.text_plain: And I will bring forth a seed out of Jacob, and out of Judah an inheritor of my mountains: and mine elect shall inherit it, and my servants shall dwell there.
verses.verse_html: 9And I will bring forth a seed out of Jacob, and out of Judah an inheritor of my mountains: and mine elect shall inherit it, and my servants shall dwell there.

verses.text_plain: And Sharon shall be a fold of flocks, and the valley of Achor a place for the herds to lie down in, for my people that have sought me.
verses.verse_html: 10And Sharon shall be a fold of flocks, and the valley of Achor a place for the herds to lie down in, for my people that have sought me.

verses.text_plain: But ye are they that forsake the Lord, that forget my holy mountain, that prepare a table for that troop, and that furnish the drink offering unto that number.
verses.verse_html:
11But ye are they that forsake the Lord, that forget my holy mountain, that prepare a table for that troop, and that furnish the drink offering unto that number. ▼
▼ troop: or, Gad
 , ▼
▼ number: or, Meni, a pagan god

footnotes.body_text: ▼ number: or, Meni, a pagan god
footnotes.body_html: ▼ number: or, Meni, a pagan god

verses.text_plain: Therefore will I number you to the sword, and ye shall all bow down to the slaughter: because when I called, ye did not answer; when I spake, ye did not hear; but did evil before mine eyes, and did choose that wherein I delighted not.
verses.verse_html: 12Therefore will I number you to the sword, and ye shall all bow down to the slaughter: because when I called, ye did not answer; when I spake, ye did not hear; but did evil before mine eyes, and did choose that wherein I delighted not.

tokens.text: and ye shall all bow down

verses.text_plain: Therefore thus saith the Lord God, Behold, my servants shall eat, but ye shall be hungry: behold, my servants shall drink, but ye shall be thirsty: behold, my servants shall rejoice, but ye shall be ashamed:
verses.verse_html: 13Therefore thus saith the Lord God, Behold, my servants shall eat, but ye shall be hungry: behold, my servants shall drink, but ye shall be thirsty: behold, my servants shall rejoice, but ye shall be ashamed:

verses.text_plain: Behold, my servants shall sing for joy of heart, but ye shall cry for sorrow of heart, and shall howl for vexation of spirit.
verses.verse_html:
14Behold, my servants shall sing for joy of heart, but ye shall cry for sorrow of heart, and shall howl for vexation of spirit. ▼
▼ vexation: Heb. breaking

verses.text_plain: And ye shall leave your name for a curse unto my chosen: for the Lord God shall slay thee, and call his servants by another name:
verses.verse_html: 15And ye shall leave your name for a curse unto my chosen: for the Lord God shall slay thee, and call his servants by another name:

verses.text_plain: That he who blesseth himself in the earth shall bless himself in the God of truth; and he that sweareth in the earth shall swear by the God of truth; because the former troubles are forgotten, and because they are hid from mine eyes.
verses.verse_html: 16That he who blesseth himself in the earth shall bless himself in the God of truth; and he that sweareth in the earth shall swear by the God of truth; because the former troubles are forgotten, and because they are hid from mine eyes.

verses.text_plain: For, behold, I create new heavens and a new earth: and the former shall not be remembered, nor come into mind.
verses.verse_html:
17For, behold, I create new heavens and a new earth: and the former shall not be remembered, nor come into mind. ▼
▼ come…: Heb. come upon the heart

footnotes.body_text: ▼ come…: Heb. come upon the heart
footnotes.body_html: ▼ come…: Heb. come upon the heart

verses.text_plain: But be ye glad and rejoice for ever in that which I create: for, behold, I create Jerusalem a rejoicing, and her people a joy.
verses.verse_html: 18But be ye glad and rejoice for ever in that which I create: for, behold, I create Jerusalem a rejoicing, and her people a joy.

verses.text_plain: And I will rejoice in Jerusalem, and joy in my people: and the voice of weeping shall be no more heard in her, nor the voice of crying.
verses.verse_html: 19And I will rejoice in Jerusalem, and joy in my people: and the voice of weeping shall be no more heard in her, nor the voice of crying.

verses.text_plain: There shall be no more thence an infant of days, nor an old man that hath not filled his days: for the child shall die an hundred years old; but the sinner being an hundred years old shall be accursed.
verses.verse_html: 20There shall be no more thence an infant of days, nor an old man that hath not filled his days: for the child shall die an hundred years old; but the sinner being an hundred years old shall be accursed.

tokens.text: There shall be no more thence an infant

verses.text_plain: And they shall build houses, and inhabit them; and they shall plant vineyards, and eat the fruit of them.
verses.verse_html: 21And they shall build houses, and inhabit them; and they shall plant vineyards, and eat the fruit of them.

verses.text_plain: They shall not build, and another inhabit; they shall not plant, and another eat: for as the days of a tree are the days of my people, and mine elect shall long enjoy the work of their hands.
verses.verse_html:
22They shall not build, and another inhabit; they shall not plant, and another eat: for as the days of a tree are the days of my people, and mine elect shall long enjoy the work of their hands. ▼
▼ shall long…: Heb. shall make them continue long, or, shall wear out

footnotes.body_text: ▼ shall long…: Heb. shall make them continue long, or, shall wear out
footnotes.body_html: ▼ shall long…: Heb. shall make them continue long, or, shall wear out

verses.text_plain: They shall not labour in vain, nor bring forth for trouble; for they are the seed of the blessed of the Lord, and their offspring with them.
verses.verse_html: 23They shall not labour in vain, nor bring forth for trouble; for they are the seed of the blessed of the Lord, and their offspring with them.

verses.text_plain: And it shall come to pass, that before they call, I will answer; and while they are yet speaking, I will hear.
verses.verse_html: 24And it shall come to pass, that before they call, I will answer; and while they are yet speaking, I will hear.

tokens.text: And it shall come to pass, that before they call
and while they are yet speaking

verses.text_plain: The wolf and the lamb shall feed together, and the lion shall eat straw like the bullock: and dust shall be the serpent’s meat. They shall not hurt nor destroy in all my holy mountain, saith the Lord.
verses.verse_html: 25The wolf and the lamb shall feed together, and the lion shall eat straw like the bullock: and dust shall be the serpent’s meat. They shall not hurt nor destroy in all my holy mountain, saith the Lord.
